message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $15000 to me. Considering its potential impact on your endeavors, I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a comprehensive setup and training session to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.
